feature_model.name: Type
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Type (f_Type) :m Color (f_Color) :m Theme (f_Theme) :m Size (f_Size) :m TV-Series Shirts (f_TV_Series_Shirts) :o Yellow (f_Yellow) :o White (f_White) :o Red (f_Red) :o Blue (f_Blue) :o Green (f_Green) :o Personalization (f_Personalization) :g [1, *] : Name (f_Name) : Signature (f_Signature) :o Logo (f_Logo) :o Pink (f_Pink) :g [1, 1] : Baby Cut (f_Baby_Cut) : Longsleeve (f_Longsleeve) : Girl Cut (f_Girl_Cut) : Normal Cut (f_Normal_Cut) :g [1, 1] : Chuck (f_Chuck) : LOST (f_LOST) : Simpsons (f_Simpsons) : Black (f_Black) :m CSI (f_CSI) : Sex and the City (f_Sex_and_the_City) :g [1, 1] : Small (f_Small) : Medium (f_Medium) : Large (f_Large) : Extra Large (f_Extra_Large)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Sex_and_the_City or f_Pink constraint_2:~f_Sex_and_the_City or f_Girl_Cut constraint_3:~f_Pink or ~f_LOST
